name: Stakeholder Introduction
description:
An exercise to help you and your stakeholders or collaborators get acquainted.

 

A project stakeholder is a person or entity interested in a given project or who you need to work with to complete the project.

 

If you're unsure who your stakeholders are, think of all the people affected by your work, who will influence it, or who have an interest in its successful or unsuccessful conclusion.

 

This template contains 23 great conversation-starting questions for you and your stakeholders.
